title: Narcissism and Fear: The Fixation Strategy of Seeking Fulfilment.
first_phrase: In this final section, the idea of the observer/personality dyad strategy is explored further, revealing that the fixation on their created image can lead to a sense of narcissism and fear of not being enough. This fear leads to a tendency to fill up at all costs, which can result in a feeling of being a fraud. The fixation of attention strategy #7 is discussed in detail, with a focus on the emptiness of Essence being perceived as scarce and void of wisdom. The text also provides a seven-step guide to facing the emptiness and finding peace within it.
